lead_paragraph: John Maine dominated the St. Louis Cardinals with the poise of a veteran and Jose Reyes sparked the offense with a leadoff home run as the Mets won Game 6 of the N.L.C.S.
snippet: John Maine dominated the St. Louis Cardinals with the poise of a veteran and Jose Reyes sparked the offense with a leadoff home run as the Mets won Game 6 of the N.L.C.S.
